name: When I Knew You
description:
Due to some unfortunate incidences, Callum moves back to his hometown with his father, where he hopes to reconnect with his four childhood friends. However, when he arrives, the news is broken to him: one of them has run away from home.

Throughout his senior year, he tries to find what lead to these events, what kind of people his friends became, and who exactly he can trust with the truth.

Does distance truly bring fondness? Or does it drive people apart to the point they're unrecognizable?

Story and Art by Konpeito
